title: 在服务器里点家具MOD的洗衣机就会崩溃
author: smwj264
txt_content:
本帖最后由 smwj264 于 2013-10-21 20:00 编辑 

自己搞了个小服务器跟同学玩，里面有家具MOD 可是他们都不能使用家具MOD里的一些物品 右键点开冰箱的下半层跟点烤箱都会直接游戏崩溃 可是我点这些东西却没有任何问题 这是为什么 怎么解决 谢谢

2013-10-21 19:56:15 [SEVERE] [ForgeModLoader] A critical server error occured handling a packet, kicking 33338
java.lang.ClassCastException: net.minecraft.jammy780.furniture.tiles.jfm_TileEntityCeramicBlocksOne cannot be cast to net.minecraft.jammy780.furniture.tiles.jfm_TileEntityIronBlocksOne
        at net.minecraft.jammy780.furniture.blocks.iron.jfm_IronBlocksOne.func_71903_a(jfm_IronBlocksOne.java:88)
        at net.minecraft.item.ItemInWorldManager.func_73078_a(ItemInWorldManager.java:575)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetServerHandler.func_72472_a(NetServerHandler.java:869)
        at net.minecraft.network.packet.Packet15Place.func_73279_a(SourceFile:58)
        at org.spigotmc.netty.NettyNetworkManager.func_74428_b(NettyNetworkManager.java:189)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetServerHandler.func_72570_d(NetServerHandler.java:213)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetworkListenThread.func_71747_b(NetworkListenThread.java:53)
        at org.spigotmc.netty.NettyServerConnection.func_71747_b(NettyServerConnection.java:68)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:918)
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:323)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:786)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:670)
        at net.minecraft.server.ThreadMinecraftServer.run(SourceFile:573)

这个是报错的信息 麻烦看下

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content: 请你确认他们装的MOD跟你的MOD是同一个版本

replies.author: 恶魔白鲨
replies.txt_content: mod版本不对，可以按照相应版本下载mod
